mapper.select: select j.jname,j.jid,j.introduction,j.start,j.end,j.startdate,GROUP_CONCAT(l.lname)as lname,s1.sname as sname from job j left join job_light jl on j.jid = jl.jid left join light l on jl.lid = l.lid left join story s1 on j.story1 = s1.sid left join story s2 on j.story2 = s2.sid left join story s3 on j.story3 = s3.sid GROUP BY j.jid
